three of Gordon Ramsey's restaurants
here in London that's right I flew all
the way to London just for this first
let's back up about 1 year ago I went to

three of Gordon Ramsey's restaurants
where I was a very very harsh
critic that is delicious wow well today
I'm back at it again here in London this
is Gordon Ramsey's home turf but will
his restaurants be up to my standards
we're going to go to three different
Gordon Ramsey restaurants at three
different price points one that's very
affordable one that is mid-priced and
one fine dining restaurant where I will
order the most expensive thing I can
find on the menu right now we're headed
to our first location let's move right
behind me is our first location this
place is called Street Pizza by Gordon
Ramsey Street Pizza offers a
straightforward menu with an emphasis on
unlimited Pizza served by the slice the
idea is to provide a relaxed and social

with sides desserts and Cocktails they
